name: What every body is saying
description: What Every BODY is Saying by Joe Navarro is a guide to reading nonverbal communication. Written by a former FBI agent, it helps readers interpret body language to enhance communication and detect deception
author: Joe Navarro

name: Atomic Habits
description: Atomic Habits by James Clear offers a practical guide to building good habits and breaking bad ones
author: James Clear

name: Sapiens
description: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind by Yuval Noah Harari explores the history of humanity from the emergence of Homo sapiens to the present.
author: Yuval Noah Harari

name: The Order of Time
description: The Order of Time by Carlo Rovelli explores the nature of time from a scientific perspective.
author: Carlo Rovelli

name: The Psychology of Money
description: The Psychology of Money by Morgan Housel delves into the emotional and psychological aspects of personal finance.
author: Morgan Housel

name: Einstein
description: Einstein: His Life and Universe by Walter Isaacson is a comprehensive biography of Albert Einstein.
author: Walter Isaacson
